startText:
🌷**𝗛ᴇʟʟᴏ %s**,

🥀𝗧ʜɪs 𝗜s 𝗧ᴇʟᴇɢʀᴀᴍ **𝗠ᴜsɪᴄ 𝗣ʟᴀʏᴇʀ**
𝗜 𝗖ᴀɴ 𝗦ᴛʀᴇᴀᴍ **𝗟ɪᴠᴇs**, **𝗥ᴀᴅɪᴏs**, **𝗬ᴏᴜTᴜʙᴇ 𝗩ɪᴅᴇᴏs**, 𝗧ᴇʟᴇɢʀᴀᴍ **𝗔ᴜᴅɪᴏ 𝗔ɴᴅ 𝗩ɪᴅᴇᴏ 𝗙ɪʟᴇs** 𝗢ɴ 𝗩ᴏɪᴄᴇ 𝗖ʜᴀᴛ 𝗢ғ 𝗧ᴇʟᴇɢʀᴀᴍ 𝗚ʀᴏᴜᴏs. 𝗟ᴇᴛ's 𝗘ɴᴊᴏʏ 𝗧ʜᴇ **𝗖ɪɴᴇᴍᴀᴛɪᴄ 𝗩ɪᴇᴡ** 𝗢ғ 𝗠ᴜsɪᴄ 𝗣ʟᴀʏᴇʀ 𝗪ɪᴛʜ 𝗬ᴏᴜʀ 𝗙ʀɪᴇɴᴅs 🌷😇!

** 🌷 𝗢ᴡɴᴇʀ 🌷- @ITz_Tulip_XD
helpText:
🌷**𝗠ʏ 𝗖ᴏᴍᴍᴀɴᴅs🌷**

🌷 <prefix>ping
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `check if alive or not`

🌷 <prefix>repo
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `show the bot source code`

🌷 <prefix>start | <prefix>help
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `show the help for commands`

🌷 <prefix>mode | <prefix>switch
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `switch the stream mode (audio/video)`

🌷 <prefix>p | <prefix>play [song name | youtube link]
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `play a song in vc, if already playing add to queue`

🌷 <prefix>radio | <prefix>stream [radio url | stream link]
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `play a live stream in vc, if already playing add to queue`

🌷 <prefix>pl | <prefix>playlist [youtube playlist link]
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `play the whole youtube playlist at once`

🌷 <prefix>skip | <prefix>next
Usag𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `skip to the next song`

🌷 <prefix>m | <prefix>mute
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `mute the current stream`

🌷 <prefix>um | <prefix>unmute
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `unmute the muted stream`

🌷 <prefix>ps | <prefix>pause
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `pause the current stream`

🌷 <prefix>rs | <prefix>resume
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `resume the paused stream`

🌷 <prefix>list | <prefix>queue
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `show the songs in the queue`

🌷 <prefix>mix | <prefix>shuffle
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `shuffle the queued playlist`

🌷 <prefix>loop | <prefix>repeat
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `enable or disable the loop mode`

🌷 <prefix>lang | language [language code]
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `set the bot language in a group`

🌷 <prefix>ip | <prefix>import
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `import queue from exported file`

🌷 <prefix>ep | <prefix>export
Usage𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `export the queue for import in future`

🌷 <prefix>stop | <prefix>leave
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `leave from vc and clear the queue`

🌷 <prefix>restart | <prefix>update
𝗨sᴀɢᴇ : `restart and update your music player`

© **𝗣ᴏᴡᴇʀᴇᴅ 𝗕ʏ : @ITz_Tulip_XD 🌷**
